product_name: DevaCurlSUPERCREAM Infused Definer Hydra-Definition Blend Multitasking Styler
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingMeet DevaCurl's superhero styler, SUPERCREAM Infused Definer Hydra-Definition Blend Multitasking Styler. This multitasking, ultra-rich cream with a hydra-definition blend provides coarse curls with smoothness, shape, shine and frizz control.
details: DetailsBenefitsGives coarse curls ultimate curl flexibilityMaintains moisture, hydrates & smoothes curlsTames frizzMaintains curl length up to 96 hoursProvides coarse curls with smoothness, shape, shine & frizz controlFeaturesHydra-definition blend also encourages curl shape and definition, enhances curl body and shape, adds shine, improves manageability & combability, minimizes flyaways, and is non-flaking, non-stiff and non-crunchyDermatologist co-developed, backed by science & stylist approvedA warm, creamy coconut scent that is luxurious & addictiveBottle made from 50% recycled plasticsGluten-free, cruelty-free & veganFormulated WithoutSLS/SLES sulfatesSiliconesParabensItem 2581686How To UseRub between palms and smooth over soaking wet curls.On thicker curls, apply in sections.Do not rinse.Style as usual.Shake at the root when fully dry for a boost.If you have dry, fine curls, Wave Maker, a lightweight cream with a hydra-definition blend is recommended. If you have dry, medium to coarse curls, DevaCurl recommends Styling Cream, a rich cream with a hydra-definition blend.Keep out of the reach of children. In the event of contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly with water.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Ppg-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Behentrimonium Chloride, Laureth-4, Aminomethyl Propanol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid, Disodium Edta, Ethyl Macadamiate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Etidronic Acid, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Isopropyl Alcohol, Malic Acid, Panthenol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum/Fragrance, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Citronellol, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.As is common in the hair care industry, from time to time DevaCurl may update certain ingredients, such as preservative systems or fragrance, to improve quality, enhance the performance of the product, or to comply with the latest regulatory requirements. You should always check the product's packaging for the most up to date and accurate ingredient information.DevaCurl products go through rigorous testing and adhere to all relevant cosmetics regulations for product safety before they reach the market.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Rub between palms and smooth over soaking wet curls.On thicker curls, apply in sections.Do not rinse.Style as usual.Shake at the root when fully dry for a boost.If you have dry, fine curls, Wave Maker, a lightweight cream with a hydra-definition blend is recommended. If you have dry, medium to coarse curls, DevaCurl recommends Styling Cream, a rich cream with a hydra-definition blend.Keep out of the reach of children. In the event of contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly with water.

reviews.headline: I have been buying this product for over a year and a half
reviews.comments: I use to blow dry my hair and never embraced my curl.  I have tried several products to keep my hair curly without any frizz and so far this is the best ever.  I only wash my hair twice a week and this product keeps my curl until the next wash.  All I do is apply the product to wet hair scrunch my hair and let it dry naturally.  The next morning I take my wet hands and just scrunch my entire head.  Again air dry.  I don't have to worry about the humidity or the wind blowing and it keeps without frizz.  Give it a try.

reviews.headline: Smells great and nurtures my waves!
reviews.comments: Love this product!

reviews.headline: Finally found THE product
reviews.comments: I've tried product after product, and this is the first that left my curls soft, defined, crunch-free, and frizz-free.  I love it!

reviews.headline: Hold my curls & waves without feeling stiff.
reviews.comments: Nice product!

reviews.headline: Works well
reviews.comments: I have fine, wavy hair and this product works great to define my curls.

reviews.headline: Supercream definer
reviews.comments: I love it! I was nervous to try this again after the history of what happened before but since devacurl reformulated I decided to give them another chance and I am glad I did. I remember loving this product and it's still just as good as it use to be.

reviews.headline: Great product, recommend
reviews.comments: I recommend this product for curl hair. I've struggled for many years, trying to find the right product for my curl hair of chaos. I don't want my hair to be crunchy either. Like smooth curls. I went to a salon and thus stylish  helped me, as she had also experienced the curl hair struggles. I use very little which my hair is now shorter. But hey, it works for me.

reviews.headline: Perfect consistency
reviews.comments: Smells good. Creamy but not too heavy.

reviews.headline: My go to
reviews.comments: I've been using this for years. When the price jumped by $6 I started looking for a different product to use. Unfortunately I haven't found anything that works for my hair as good as this does.

reviews.headline: Harmful product subject of lawsuit!
reviews.comments: I used this product for several years. My hair had been getting thinner, but the thinning noticeably increased around the time I started using this. Deva Curl settled a class action lawsuit due to their products causing hair loss and rash. Stay away!

reviews.headline: Love love love this product for my curly hair.
reviews.comments: This product gives me control of my curly hair. Helps to reduce frizzy curl.

reviews.headline: I would not buy again
reviews.comments: I did not like that it is heavy for my hair and leaves a heavy wax feel. Would not buy again.

reviews.headline: Repeat buyer
reviews.comments: Works well for my hair!  A bottle lasts a long time since I don't need a lot product.

reviews.headline: Great, but not worth it
reviews.comments: When I first used this product, I loved how it made my curly hair look. After using almost the whole bottle, I started to notice a lot of hair loss in the shower. I thought it was just stress or age, but when I started investigating more and saw that other women had the same problem, I stopped using it. Not worth the risk, will continue to find other brands for curly hair that don't cause hair loss.

reviews.headline: Love Deva Curl product!
reviews.comments: The verdict is still out as I just purchased this past weekend.  Finally had my natural curly hair cut by a certified Deva Curl Hairstylist & love the cut.  She used this product.  I use DC shampoo/ conditioner & gel so I'm sure this is great!

reviews.headline: Will Never Buy Again
reviews.comments: I've used some deva curl products and loved. This product made my hair feel greasy. It looked so lack lustre and had no bounce or body. Waste of money. Don't buy.

reviews.headline: I wish it was formaldehyde-free. I am allergic.
reviews.comments: I absolutely love how this makes my hair look, but I am allergic to formaldehyde-releasers (makes me feel like I have arthritis in hands, shoulder, and lower right back area), and this has Disodium EDTA in it, which is one. I contacted DevaCurl a while ago about getting rid of formaldehydes because so many people are allergic to them and they said, "it is a preservative."  I told them I am a formulator and am aware of that but there are many safe ones that they can use like anything from the Optiphen family that have no formaldehyde, paraben, or sulfate.  Why keep it in there??!!  Go completely clean. Please!

reviews.headline: Made my hair fall out
reviews.comments: I have used this product for 3 months and I noticed my hair started to fall out and gave me a a rash around my scalp. Do not buy this product or others. They make your hair fall out. There are other products out there that do not cause your hair to fall out.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I've bought this many times. Does well to tame my curly hair frizz without making it crusty.

reviews.headline: STOP BUYING THIS!!!!
reviews.comments: I cannot believe Ulta is still carrying this brand after thousands upon THOUSANDS of reports from women with thinning hair, losing clumps of hair, tinnitus (just to name a few symptoms ruining lives). STAY AWAY!

media.headline: Such an amazing product for your curly hair. The cream feels

faceoff_positive.comments:
I received this product complimentary from DevaCurl. This is my first product that I have tried from the DevaCurl's line. This multitasking, ultra-rich cream with a hydra-definition blend provides my thick curls with smoothness, shine and frizz control. It helps a lot with how my hair typically gets frizzy throughout the day maintain it's normal shape. 

Benefits 
	•	Gives coarse curls ultimate curl flexibility
	•	Maintains moisture, hydrates & smoothes curls
	•	Tames frizz
	•	Maintains curl length up to 96 hours
	•	Provides coarse curls with smoothness, shape, shine & frizz control
faceoff_positive.headline: Frizz maintained

faceoff_negative.comments: I absolutely love how this makes my hair look, but I am allergic to formaldehyde-releasers (makes me feel like I have arthritis in hands, shoulder, and lower right back area), and this has Disodium EDTA in it, which is one. I contacted DevaCurl a while ago about getting rid of formaldehydes because so many people are allergic to them and they said, "it is a preservative."  I told them I am a formulator and am aware of that but there are many safe ones that they can use like anything from the Optiphen family that have no formaldehyde, paraben, or sulfate.  Why keep it in there??!!  Go completely clean. Please!
